articles.title: Meet Dr. B, the startup promising a better way to distribute leftover vaccines - The Verge
articles.description: A new service called Dr. B, created by ZocDoc founder Cyrus Massoumi, is asking users to sign up for a chance at vaccines leftover from missed appointments and other errors, hoping their text-based standby system will be less chaotic.
